abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr says he remains undecided about presidential run, citing his family's emotional fragility after his son's death from cancer; aides don't expect decision on candidacy before early October.
lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. said he was unsure whether he had the “emotional energy” for a run, telling an audience, “I can’t look you straight in the eye and say now, ‘I know I can do it.’”
snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. said he was unsure whether he had the “emotional energy” for a run, telling an audience, “I can’t look you straight in the eye and say now, ‘I know I can do it.’”
